itunes:title: 20 gym terms you should know
title: 20 gym terms you should know
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
Take a seats F&G fam, because class is in session! This week, Britt is going over 20 gym terms that every gym goer should know. Test your knowledge as we walk through the most popular abbreviations, workout splits, EMOM's, pump covers, drop sets, DOMS & so many more!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!


Timestamps

00:30 weekly update

2:00 reviews

3:16 class is in session

4:00 abbreviations: BB KB DB

4:40 push/pull

5:00 pull day

5:50 push day

6:16 a workout split

6:55 PR/PB

8:10 1RM

10:55 EMOM

13:10 pump cover

14:20 DOMS

14:47 acute muscle soreness 

17:10 hypertrophy

18:00 ROM

19:50 AMRAP

20:50 sets X reps

22:20 RPE

23:35 drop set

25:11 compound & super set

26:20 compound & isolation exercises
